Text: I wouldn't download this without any maleware-scan results.

@Bluexar 
Kinda difficult to do when the file is nearly 1gb... Most online malware scanners can only scan up to like 50mbs.

this works 100%

for those that are having troubles navigating in russian,you can change language with launcher.exe in your main game folder,then on the left side you have 4 boxes you can tick,tick the one with the longest name ,it starts with capital A
then to start the game in english click the left box on the right. voila,english! :)
